definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Always drink when you are thirsty, and have water available during the day to hydrate regularly.
sentences.chinese: 总是喝当你渴了，有水可在白天到水合物定期。

sentences.english: And God split open the hollow place that is at Lehi, and water came out from it.
sentences.chinese: 神就使利希的洼处裂开，有水从其中涌出来。

sentences.english: The presence of water on Mars is a hot topic for scientists.
sentences.chinese: 有水存在的火星对于科学家来说是一个热门的话题。

sentences.english: Dogleg left. water on the left. Green is narrow and long.
sentences.chinese: 左狗腿，左边有水，果岭长而窄。

sentences.english: With the water pollution going on someday we shall die with no water to drink at all.
sentences.chinese: 水净化对总有一天我们会必生出有水喝的根柢。

sentences.english: It sends an alarm signal indicating the presence of water or other aqueous liquids.
sentences.chinese: 它会发出报警信号，表明有水或其他含水液体存在。

sentences.english: Desert gardeners may have to water more frequently.
sentences.chinese: 沙漠园丁可能有水更频繁。

sentences.english: They give water to all the beasts of the field; the wild donkeys quench their thirst.
sentences.chinese: 使野地的走兽有水喝，野驴得解其渴。

sentences.english: Water is one of the most crucial elements in ecological landscape, for it's the source of all lives.
sentences.chinese: 水是生态景观中最重要的元素之一，有水才会有生命。

sentences.english: This is a mineral (that)you've got to have water to make.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种必须有水才能生成的矿物。

sentences.english: "No, there's definitely water in the carburetor, " she insisted.
sentences.chinese: “不，汽化器里肯定有水，”她坚持说。

sentences.english: S- if that's water how did they get there? Undergound river?
sentences.chinese: 如果有水的话，水是怎么过去的，地下河吗？

sentences.english: The ecological environment would be improved with water and deteriorated without water.
sentences.chinese: 有水或无水是生态环境恶化与改善的症结所在。

sentences.english: The camels smell the water a mile off .
sentences.chinese: 骆驼在一里之外就可嗅出有水。

sentences.english: I looked up and found we had water dripping through the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 我抬头一看，发现有水渗过天花板滴下来。

sentences.english: Dogleg left, water on left. Teeshot too much right will leave longer approach distance.
sentences.chinese: 左狗腿，左边有水，开波太右会令攻果岭更远。

definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
water source/water supply/headwaters of a river
upper reaches (of a river)/to go upstream/to add some water/to water (a crop etc)
to collect water/to be covered with water/to pond/accumulated water/ponding
lit. verdant hills and limpid water (idiom)/fig. enchanting scenery
